[short] skip

# Most packages in std do not have an install target.
go list -f '{{.Target}}' fmt
! stdout .
go list -export -f '{{.Export}}' fmt
stdout $GOCACHE

# Packages that use cgo still do.
go list -f '{{.Target}}' runtime/cgo
stdout .
go list -export -f '{{.Export}}' runtime/cgo
! stdout $GOCACHE
stdout cgo\.a
